doc.field: Series I. Women's Sports Foundation archives
Series I. Women's Sports Foundation archives

Series I includes two groups of files originally stored in the WSF office in vertical filing cabinets labeled "WSF Archives" and "WSF Publications." These files were maintained by WSF staff as the core historical documentation and internal reference files for the organization. The "WSF Archives," or chronological files, includes early descriptions of the organization, annual reports, scholarship guides, coach and parent handbooks, reports and studies, event documents, and clippings. The publication archive includes WSF-produced official newsletters and magazines documenting WSF activities, priorities, and changes over time. Material in this series dates from the creation of WSF in 1974 to 2018.
